tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_name VARCHAR(255),
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    location_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    reading_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE readings (
    reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    reading_value FLOAT,
    reading_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SensorHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    recorded_time TIMESTAMP,
    sensor_value FLOAT,
    CONSTRAINT FK_sensor_id FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES SensorData(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    log_message TEXT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sensors (sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
              sensor_name VARCHAR(255),
              location VARCHAR(255),
              sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
              installed_date DATE)

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                   sensor_id INT,
                   reading_value FLOAT,
                   timestamp TIMESTAMP,
                   FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id))

CREATE TABLE sensor_categories (category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                       category_name VARCHAR(255))

CREATE TABLE sensor_logs (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                   sensor_id INT,
                   log_message TEXT,
                   log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
                   FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id))

CREATE TABLE sensor_metadata (metadata_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                       sensor_id INT,
                       metadata_key VARCHAR(50),
                       metadata_value TEXT,
                       FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id))
